meanings.definition: Filled or stuffed, especially with food.
meanings.sent1: The rellenos peppers were delicious and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: She ordered the rellenos burrito for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The rellenos empanadas were so full, they almost burst!
meanings.sent4: The rellenos sandwich was a delightful explosion of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The rellenos dish was a mouthwatering delight.

meanings.definition: The act of filling or stuffing something.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the rellenos of the tacos with extra cheese.
meanings.sent2: The rellenos of the dumplings were perfectly seasoned.
meanings.sent3: The rellenos of the piñata were a surprise for the kids.
meanings.sent4: The rellenos of the suitcase made it difficult to close.
meanings.sent5: The rellenos of the jar overflowed with candies.
